Back to Sergei Rachmaninoff

Sergei Rachmaninoff

The Flight of the Bumblebee from The Tale of Tsar Saltan (Nikolai Rimsky-Korsakov)

c. 1929 · Threlfall and Norris III/9

[Wikipedia page 1] · [Wikipedia page 2] · [IMSLP]

This is an arrangement of an interlude from Nikolai Rimsky-Korsakov’s opera The Tale of Tsar Saltan (op. 57).

Duration: 1'

Difficulty: 3.5
